header.name: ShoulderCam Addon : LEGACY VERSION [Behaviour Pack]
header.description:
Please enable "Holiday Creator Features" and "Experimental Cameras" experimental toggles.
Enhance your 3rd person view with a Shoulder-view Camera! For versions 1.20.0 to 1.21.2.

modules.description:
Enhance your 3rd person view with a Shoulder-view Camera!
Updated to use Script API for 1.21.20+, no experimental toggle needed.
